item.title: [JUSTO] Promoter Puspamitra Das Acquires 1,000 Equity Shares of Justo Realfintech Ltd via Open Market
item.description:
Puspamitra Das, a promoter of Justo Realfintech Ltd, has acquired 1,000 equity shares of the company through the open market. The acquisition took place on 2nd January 2026. Before the acquisition, the promoter held 38.18% voting rights in the company. After the acquisition, the holding increased to 38.185%. The company's equity share capital and total voting capital remain unchanged at INR 18,79,81,420 consisting of 1,87,98,142 Equity Shares of Rs. 10 each.

item.title: [SYSCHEM] Syschem India Ltd Commences Commercial Production of New and Expanded Units
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Syschem India Ltd has started the commercial production from 5th January, 2026, for its new production unit and expanded existing unit. The new production unit, named 'Ganga', is located at Village Bargodam, Tehsil Kalka, District Panchkula, Haryana. It is manufacturing products like 'Cloxacillin Sodium, Dicloxacillin Sodium and Flucloxacillin Sodium' with an installed capacity of 600 MT per annum. The existing unit, named 'SARU', has also started commercial production of 'Amoxicillin' with an installed capacity of 1200 MT per annum. These developments are expected to enhance the overall production capacity, improve operational efficiency, and meet growing market demand.

  • Syschem India Ltd starts commercial production of new production unit 'Ganga'
  • New unit located at Village Bargodam, Tehsil Kalka, District Panchkula, Haryana
  • Producing 'Cloxacillin Sodium, Dicloxacillin Sodium and Flucloxacillin Sodium' with 600 MT annual capacity
  • Commercial production of expanded existing unit 'SARU' started
  • Producing 'Amoxicillin' with 1200 MT annual capacity

item.title: [ZSANMCOM] Sanmitra Commercial Ltd Receives Open Offer for Acquisition of 26.00% Equity Shares by Ankit Jalan and Anuj Jalan
item.description:
Navigant Corporate Advisors Ltd, on behalf of Ankit Jalan (Acquirer-1) and Anuj Jalan (Acquirer-2), along with Manju Jalan (PAC-1), Radhika Jalan (PAC-2), Prachi Jalan (PAC-3), Ritu Jalan (PAC-4), Divyanshi Jalan (PAC-5) and Daivik Jalan (PAC-6), have made an open offer for the acquisition of up to 1,49,76,000 Equity Shares of Rs. 10/- each representing 26.00% of the expanded equity and voting share capital of Sanmitra Commercial Limited. The offer price is Rs. 15/- (Rupees Fifteen Only) per equity share payable in cash. The Committee of Independent Directors of Sanmitra Commercial Limited is of the opinion that the offer price is in accordance with the relevant regulations prescribed in the Takeover Code and prima facie appear to be justified.

  • The offer price is Rs. 15/- (Rupees Fifteen Only) per equity share payable in cash.

item.title: [CENTRALBK] Central Bank of India Discloses Q3 FY 2025-26 Business Figures: Total Business Surges by 15.80% Y-o-Y
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Central Bank of India has released its provisional business figures for the third quarter of the financial year 2025-26, as of 31.12.2025. The bank's total business has shown a significant growth of 15.80% Y-o-Y and 10.18% Y-T-D. Total deposits have increased by 3.28% Y-o-Y and 9.17% Y-T-D, with CASA deposits growing by 8.53% Y-o-Y and 5.26% Y-T-D. The CASA percentage stands at 47.12%, a decrease of 206 bps from the previous year and 179 bps from the beginning of the year. Gross advances have increased by 19.57% Y-o-Y and 11.61% Y-T-D. The bank's CD ratio stands at 72.06%, an increase of 381 bps from the previous year and 153 bps from the beginning of the year. These figures are subject to review by the bank's Statutory Central Auditors.

  • Total Business surges by 15.80% Y-o-Y
  • Total Deposits increase by 3.28% Y-o-Y and 9.17% Y-T-D
  • CASA Deposits grow by 8.53% Y-o-Y and 5.26% Y-T-D
  • Gross Advances increase by 19.57% Y-o-Y and 11.61% Y-T-D
  • CD Ratio stands at 72.06%, an increase of 381 bps Y-o-Y and 153 bps Y-T-D
